article_text: In an effort to force Texas to expand Medicaid under the Affordable Care Act, the Obama administration is threatening to withhold billions in federal funds for a Medicaid waiver that provides supplemental funding to hospitals treating Medicaid patients.

article_metadata.title: Feds aren’t telling the truth about Texas Medicaid funds | The Star-Telegram
